thread.title: Obama Ends ‘Wet Foot, Dry Foot’ Policy For Cuban Immigrants [VIDEO]
thread.title_full: Obama Ends ‘Wet Foot, Dry Foot’ Policy For Cuban Immigrants [VIDEO]

author: Christian Datoc
title: Obama Ends ‘Wet Foot, Dry Foot’ Policy For Cuban Immigrants [VIDEO]
text:
5420212 
The Obama administration’s latest immigration move might actually please the staunchest of immigration opponents. People look at a Cuban migrant boat that brought 12 people and a dog to the beach on September 15, 2015 in Miami Beach, Florida (Getty Images) 
According to the Associated Press , the administration is ending the “wet foot, dry foot” policy. 
Senior administration officials told the AP the policy change will immediately go into effect. 
“Wet foot, dry foot” grants legal, residential status to Cuban immigrants who come to the United States without visas. People look at a Cuban migrant boat that brought 12 people and a dog to the beach on September 15, 2015 in Miami Beach, Florida (Getty Images) 
Obama’s team has reportedly been negotiating the policy change with Cuba ever since the two countries began patching up diplomatic relations back in 2016.
